metadata.description: Tetsu Koiwai is your average teacher that just so happens to be the caretaker of his vampire childhood friend Shima Inoue. In an effort to closely watch over Shima and keep him out of harm's way, they have formed a student-teacher relationship. The plot thickens however, when Shima has a taste of jealousy and Tetsu's blood.
metadata.name: Kiss My Blood (Yaoi Manga)
